title: Our Tech Stack: Built with Japanese Innovation
excerpt: Discover the modern Japanese-developed technologies powering Rox, including Hono, Waku, and Jotai.
content:
TODO: Add full blog post content.

Rox is built with a carefully selected stack of modern technologies, many of which were developed in Japan.

Key technologies:
- Hono: Ultra-fast web framework
- Waku: React Server Components framework
- Jotai: Atomic state management
- Bun: Fast JavaScript runtime
author: Rox Team
